metadata.name: build destroy repeat ∞
metadata.description:
build destroy repeat  
build destroy repeat  
build destroy repeat  

"build destroy repeat ∞" began as a physical assemblage style painting that was made as a tribute to Terrell Jones "Born 2 Die" piece.

this piece was always meant to self-destruct.

mediums used:  
cardboard  
acrylic paint  
mirror  
tiny cinnamon broom  
DOOM vinyl cover  
fiat dollar bills  
construction adhesive  
metal wire  
lighter fluid  
flame


final 2022 Adam Toksöz piece, & third and final sacrificial piece of the year.

attributes.value: Final piece of 2022, & third and final sacrificial physical piece of the year
